title: Why do we need to know the history of the Philippines? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s very important to learn history of the Philippines and its people. Given the availability of social media and the ease to travel it’s important to learn and understand the people, their origin and ethnicity, their way of life, their language and cultures, the weather, economy, food, transport, places, government, etc. It’s the best place for retirement and tourism, setting up business given the young work force, improving infrastructures, nice places to go, etc.
